answer: The products impacted by an asteroid impact in Vietnam are those supplied by suppliers located in Vietnam. The Cypher results indicate the following products are supplied by those suppliers:
Since all these products are associated with suppliers in Vietnam, none of them are unaffected by the asteroid impact.
Therefore, there are no products that are not impacted by an asteroid impact in Vietnam based on the provided data.

queries.cypher: MATCH (p:Product)-[:USES]->(comp:Component)-[:SUPPLIED_BY]->(s:Supplier)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(c:Country {name: $country_name}) RETURN p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name LIMIT 50
queries.reason: Finding products that are supplied by suppliers located in Vietnam.

results.cypher: MATCH (p:Product)-[:USES]->(comp:Component)-[:SUPPLIED_BY]->(s:Supplier)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(c:Country {name: $country_name}) RETURN p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name LIMIT 50
results.reason: Finding products that are supplied by suppliers located in Vietnam.
